```{r}
dat1 <- tibble(h = seq(0,30,by=1),
               R = 1)
dat1 %<>% mutate(f = R/(1+h*R))
dat1 %>% ggplot(., aes(x=h, y=f)) + geom_line()

dat2 <- tibble(h = 1,
               R = seq(30,0,by=-1))
dat2 %<>% mutate(f = R/(1+h*R))
dat2 %>% ggplot(., aes(x=R, y=f)) + geom_line()

```
